DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate accuracy Flash Glucose Monitoring system ( FGM ) , Abbot FreeStyle Libre , use today clinical practice Sweden estimate plasma glucose level . Data collect ambulatory patient type 1 diabetes determine safety , accuracy , reliability .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Flash Glucose Monitoring System Ambulatory Patients With Type 1 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: 1 . Type 1 diabetes 2 . Adult patient , age 18 old < 75 year 3 . Written inform consent 1 . Pregnancy 2 . Patients severe cognitive dysfunction disease make FGM use difficult 3 . History allergic reaction FGMs material adhesives Contact skin . 4 . History allergic reaction chlorhexidine alcohol antiseptic solution . 5 . Continous Glucose Monitor ( CGM ) FGM usage last month 6 . Abnormal skin anticipate glucose sensor attachment site ( excessive hair , burn , inflammation , infection , rash , and/or tattoo )
